newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mostly higher in sluggish trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mostly higher in sluggish trade.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mostly higher in sluggish trade on Thursday with continued gains among blue chips.
* Of twelve active issues seven rose, four fell and one was flat.
* Turnover shrank to 3.6 million kuna and volume to 6,852 shares.
* Top gainer was Zagrebacka Banka's C-series bearer stock, up 5.5 percent to 850 kuna on a meagre volume of 12 shares.
* Hotel Intercontinental led decliners falling 2.94 percent to 165 kuna with 69 shares sold.
* Most actively traded issue was Podravka food concern, selling 3,530 units to close 0.50 kuna higher at 305.50.
